channel.title: [317] 24/7 ~~ Rapid Manufacturing RS ~~ [PI] [VPS]
channel.description:
Hello Moparscapers,
I'll be advertising my new development team in this topic, some of you might know me from Rippedscape. I'm also known as Ripper.
[b]Anyway, to business. Let me start off with a few features our site has currently have.[/b]
-Professional web-designer -Paid domain -Awesome home page + navigators -Ventrilo channels -PHPBB Forums -Webclient -DMCA -Krackkid as lead GFX Designer. -A Rapid Manufacturing WoW server -A Rapid Manufacturing Kal Online server - - -
[b]Now, for the server sided features[/b]
-Dedicated server -100% Uptime -100% PvP -Kill exchange shops -Great combat system -[b]Project Insanity source[/b] -Unique ingame features -Full Godwars + monsters -Godwars hilts -x10 hits -459, 474, 483, 508 and 525 gameframes to choose from. -Hunting skill -100% Clanchat - - -
[b]Our Advertising banner which will be shown on most advertising sites:[/b] coming soon
The site is currently under heavy development, so It's inaccessible for users at this time.
[b]Alright, now.. What do we currently need?[/b] -Server coders -Client coders -Server Moderators -GFX Designers
If you have any of the above skills, feel free to add me on msn at: Grave-diggers@hotmail.com Also please leave a message on this topic if you do so.
[i]We expect our staff to be professional and mature at all times including proper English spelling. I don't want to give our perfect community a bad expression because of some kids that fail to behave the way I want them to. If you can't deal with me being your leader whom you will receive shit from if you don't do things right, don't add me.[/i]
I did my best to remove any advertising possible, if you spot any, please let us know.
Good luck.
last updated on Friday, 21th of January.

item.description:
@_Pandemonium wrote:

Conner
Email: connerdaviswd@hotmail.com
Applying for: Server Developer, Forum Admin (jist admin or both)
Years experience: One in Java, three in web dev (although I do not want to be a web dev for this)
Past projects: Rewrote rs2hd, added most skills and minigames, etc. I’m currently writing a framework for the 621 revision and I will end up using it for the 602 as well.

Id prefer to just be a content developer, that is my greatest skill. If not, I’m also a great Forum administrator and learned from the best.

Added you on MSN.
